resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104779</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104779</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087133</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tour of the Universe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tour des Universums</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Excursion de l'univers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Excursão do universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giro dell'universo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γύρος του κόσμου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viaje del universo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Scroll down and click on the astronomical object of your choice and start exploring the Universe...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Scroll unten und klicken Sie an die astronomische 
Nachricht Ihrer Wahl und fangen Sie an, das Universum zu 
erforschen...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites défiler vers le bas et cliquez sur
l'objet astronomique de votre choix et commencez à explorer 
l'univers...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Enrole para baixo e estale sobre o objeto 
astronômico de sua escolha e comece-o explorar o universo...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia scorrere giù e scatti sopra l'oggetto 
astronomico della vostra scelta ed inizi ad esplorare l'universo...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύλινδρος κάτω και χτυπά στο αστρονομικό 
αντικείμενο της επιλογής σας και αρχίζει τον κόσμο...</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enrolle abajo y haga clic encendido el objeto 
astronómico de su opción y comience a explorar el universo...</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087133</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104779</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/tour-of-the-universe</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
